    • canLand

      public boolean canLand(int planetIndex)
      Returns:
      if the planetIndex given (making sure it's a valid one) refers to a landable or non landable planet

    • giveReward

      public CubeToken[] giveReward(int planetIndex)
      if the planet is landable, give to the player the reward assigned to it. afterward the planet is assigned as non-landable, and if all the possible planets have been looted effectEnded is assigned true
